<div class="background-note">
<p>
My path to teaching started the summer after undergrad in a Philadelphia credit recovery program, then two years as a middle school math teacher in New Haven through Teach For America. During that time, I served as 8th Grade Chair and consulted for <a href="https://www.achievementfirst.org/opensource/">Achievement First's math curriculum</a>. I'm also passionate about CS education—I've run Girls Who Code clubs and completed Code.org's professional learning program for CS educators.
</p>
